title: Calories in 4 oz Ground Beef

quick_answer.text: 4 oz cooked ground beef provides ~287 kcal and ~28 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in 4 oz cooked ground beef?
faqs.a: About 287 kcal for 80% lean, pan-broiled and drained.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 4 oz ground beef?
Does lean percentage affect calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes—90% lean has fewer calories (~237 kcal for 4 oz) than 80% lean.

faqs.q: Are these values for raw or cooked ground beef?
faqs.a: Cooked (pan-broiled); raw has more water and slightly fewer calories per weight.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 4 oz ground beef?
faqs.a: About 18 g total fat, including 7.3 g saturated, for 80% lean cooked.
